title: Keeping His Destiny
description: Post-Apocalyptic / Dark Fantasy / Graphic Content / 18+126,521 wordsSurviving in the ruins of a world long since turned on its ear, hope for change may be fable, but one man is destined to change that.However, he needs the gift of one Symbiote woman to succeed, and the journey that will convince her to agree will not come easy— —for either of them.
author: Stephan Knox
